regex.name: search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscar Pelicula: ejemplo: Batman', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscar Pelicula: ejemplo: Batman', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige una Calidad ', ['Peliculas en DVDRIP', 'Peliculas en HD']) lists = ['http://www.mejortorrent.com/torrents-de-peliculas.html','http://www.mejortorrent.com/torrents-de-peliculas-hd-alta-definicion.html'] return lists[ret]

item.title: [B]PelisMag.Net[/B] Castellano + Buscador de Peliculas y Series

regex.name: makelist
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36

regex.name: getPageNumbers
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): frompage,topage=re.findall( "class=\"popupctrl\">Page ([0-9]+) of ([0-9]+)",page_data)[0] frompage=int(frompage) topage=int(topage) print range(frompage,topage) return range(frompage,topage)

$doregex[makelist2] [makelist.param4] [makelist.param3] #$pyFunction import re, requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): ################################################################## FORMULARY ################################################################# starturl = 'https://torrentking.eu/' ### usually, ~ 'http://website.com/category/' ### categorylink = '' ### check the number of the param ### centerurl = '/movies/' ### something like '/page/' ### firstpage = 1 ### probably = 1 ### endurl = '/' ### can be empty ### ### endurl without final / (SLASH) ### # dataregex = 'href="(.*?)"\stitle="(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,199}title="(.*?)".*?data-src="(.*?)"' ### To adapt ### headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:50.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/50.0', 'Referer': ''} ### To adapt ### ############################################################################################################################################## ############################## GENERIC PART ##################################### fullurl = starturl + categorylink + centerurl + str(firstpage) + endurl # source = requests.get(fullurl, headers= headers).text # data = [] # # last = 9 # while firstpage <= last: # try: # fullurl = starturl + categorylink + centerurl + str(firstpage) + endurl # source = requests.get(fullurl, headers=headers).text # data += re.findall(dataregex, source) # firstpage += 1 # except: # pass # return data # ##########################################################by#twogun#and#jujuuj### makelist2 55 [B][makelist2.param2][/B] Tamaño: [makelist2.param3] Seed:[makelist2.param4] - Peers:[makelist2.param5] plugin://plugin.video.quasar/play?uri=[makelist.param1] [makelist.param4] data-magnet="(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,300}(.*?)<[\w\W\s]{0,41}">(.*?)<[\w\W\s]{0,36}">(.*?)<[\w\W\s]{0,36}">(.*?)
